name: contact
description: The details of the named contacts for services and organizations.

id.name: id
id.title: Identifier
id.description: The identifier for the contact. Each contact must have a unique identifier.

organization_id.name: organization_id
organization_id.title: Organization Identifier
organization_id.description: The identifier of the organization for which this is a contact.

location_id.name: location_id
location_id.title: Location Identifier
location_id.description: The identifier for the location of the contact.

title.name: title
title.title: Title
title.description: The job title of the contact.

email.name: email
email.title: Email
email.description: The email address of the contact.

phones.name: phones
phones.title: Phones
phones.description: The details of the telephone numbers used to contact organizations, services, and locations.
